GSD.description:
ALSA: seq: Fix data-race at module auto-loading

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.142 by commit 1079d095725a66c3c45274cb62ebf1f29759c780. For more details please see the references link.
